title: How to create a zip file for photos and videos on an iPhone
content:
One of the many reasons a person would buy an iPhone is its cameras. There’s no denying that with each new release we’re noticing significant improvements to the outputted photos and videos. However, this comes at a cost — the disk space they consume. Sharper photos and videos have larger file sizes, and that can

The post How to create a zip file for photos and videos on an iPhone appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A zip compresses files to reduce the space they occupy on a disk. Here's how to create a zip file for photos and videos on an iPhone.
